pr_title: Support regex to include or exclude the names in alarm module

timeline.message: Support regex to include or exclude the names

timeline.author: kezhenxu94
kezhenxu94

timeline.bodyText:
This string#matches includes Pattern p = Pattern.compile(regex), due to we have the regex expression before all checked, I think we should compile them first when loading the config or config changed.
Could you run a benchmark to show the performance difference between this and the pre-compiled match?
timeline.author: wu-sheng

replies.bodyText:
I do a little benchmark, using regex Service\_\d+ to match Service_1, make a loop with 10 million times.
String#matches: 7198 millisecond
Pattern#matcher()#matches(): 977 millisecond
I will change to using the pre-build mode, thanks.
replies.author: mrproliu

timeline.message: using pre-build mode with regex patten

timeline.bodyText: Just a reminder, as we are using JDK8+, Optional could replace all these !=null. But both of these styles exist today. So, don't require change, anyway.
timeline.author: wu-sheng

replies.bodyText: Thanks, I will change to this way since next PR.
replies.author: mrproliu
